title: Kylie Jenner teases her figure as she poses in the shower clad in a sexy leather dress
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Kylie Jenner has done it again and shared another sexy photo - but this time she's in the shower.

The young billionaire took to her 149million Instagram followers on Saturday evening to share a behind-the-scenes snap of herself in an large open space shower where she strikes a pose.

Wearing an all black outfit, the make-up mogul grabbed the wall and looked down through the camera.

Her huge derriere is clearly in the frame as her long, black designer dress clings to her famous curves.

She paired the outfit with pointed wrap-around Balenciaga heels and sheer black tights to finish the look.

Kylie made a cheeky remark as she captioned the photo: "showering with you loooooooks," with a shower head emoji.

(Image: Instagram)

As usual, her celebrity friends flooded in with the comments, including model Sofia Richie, who said: "Should we date?"

And fans swamped the 22-year-old with sweet comments about her looks.

She recently shared a never seen before snap where she shows off her baby bump, having kept her pregnancy with Stormi secret for a whole nine months.

(Image: Instagram)

In the Instagram post, Kylie took a picture of a Polaroid of her with a huge bump as she sat on the floor in a white underwear set.

She captioned it: "i have so many belly photos but this one has always been one of my favorites. baking my little baby storm was such a special time in my life..

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

"i actually became so much stronger and independent throughout the entire experience. women really are amazing.."

She added a tribute to her own mother at the end, writing: "tag a strong woman in your life... @krisjenner ".
description: The billionaire teases her curvy figure in a skin-tight designer leather dress with stiletto boots
